languages.text: {n}Голос Ульфара становится тих и вкрадчив, а на губах играет улыбка.{/n} "Да, ты в безопасности... сейчас. Но стоит тебе выбраться из-за этого поля — и кто знает, в какой тени мы тебя подстережем? Любой шаг наружу может стать приговором. Впрочем, ты ведь можешь и не выходить, сидеть здесь день, два, месяц, год... вечность. Сидеть и дрожать. Маленький, хилый нелюдь, запертый в тюрьме из собственных игрушек и страха. Кто из нас теперь в клетке?"

{n}Ulfar's voice turns quiet and insinuating, and a smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Yes, you are safe... for now. But as soon as you step out from behind this field, who knows in what shadowy corner we'll catch you? Any step outside could mean your death. Then again, perhaps you will not come out. You might sit here for a day or two, a month, a year... forever. Sitting and trembling. A small, frail inhuman, trapped in a prison of his own toys and fear. Which of us is in a cage now?"

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは声を抑えて当てつけがましい調子で、唇に笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ああ、お前は安全だよ…今はな。だが、この戦場から踏み出せばすぐ、俺らに捕まって何をされるか分からんぞ。外に出れば死を意味する。そしたらまた、お前が目を覚ますことはないだろう。ここに1～2日、1ヶ月、1年…永久に座ってるかもしれんな。座って震えて。小さく脆弱な非人間が、自分の玩具と恐怖の檻に囚われる。俺らが今いるのはどっちの檻だろうな？」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns quiet and insinuating, and a smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Yes, you are safe... for now. But as soon as you step out from behind this field, who knows in what shadowy corner we'll catch you? Any step outside could mean your death. Then again, perhaps you will not come out. You might sit here for a day or two, a month, a year... forever. Sitting and trembling. A small, frail inhuman, trapped in a prison of his own toys and fear. Which of us is in a cage now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは声を抑えて当てつけがましい調子で、唇に笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「ああ、お前は安全だよ…今はな。だが、この戦場から踏み出せばすぐ、俺らに捕まって何をされるか分からんぞ。外に出れば死を意味する。そしたらまた、お前が目を覚ますことはないだろう。ここに1～2日、1ヶ月、1年…永久に座ってるかもしれんな。座って震えて。小さく脆弱な非人間が、自分の玩具と恐怖の檻に囚われる。俺らが今いるのはどっちの檻だろうな？」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的脸上浮现出浅浅的笑意，声音也变得平静而意味深长。{/n}“是啊，你安全了……暂时如此。然而，只要你走出这里，谁知道我们会不会突然从某个阴暗的角落里发动袭击？只要踏出来一步，你就死定了。当然了，你也可以选择永远不出来。你就在那里待着，一天、两天、一个月、一年……直到永远。你就坐在那儿瑟瑟发抖吧，可怜的小怪物，永远困在你的玩具和恐惧围成的监狱之中吧。现在，谁才是笼中之鸟？”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns quiet and insinuating, and a smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Yes, you are safe... for now. But as soon as you step out from behind this field, who knows in what shadowy corner we'll catch you? Any step outside could mean your death. Then again, perhaps you will not come out. You might sit here for a day or two, a month, a year... forever. Sitting and trembling. A small, frail inhuman, trapped in a prison of his own toys and fear. Which of us is in a cage now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的脸上浮现出浅浅的笑意，声音也变得平静而意味深长。{/n}“是啊，你安全了……暂时如此。然而，只要你走出这里，谁知道我们会不会突然从某个阴暗的角落里发动袭击？只要踏出来一步，你就死定了。当然了，你也可以选择永远不出来。你就在那里待着，一天、两天、一个月、一年……直到永远。你就坐在那儿瑟瑟发抖吧，可怜的小怪物，永远困在你的玩具和恐惧围成的监狱之中吧。现在，谁才是笼中之鸟？”

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar se fait pleine de sous-entendus tandis qu'un sourire se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Oui, vous êtes à l'abri... pour l'instant. Mais dès que vous quitterez ce champ, qui sait dans quel recoin sombre nous vous rattraperons ? Le moindre pas à l'extérieur pourrait signer votre arrêt de mort. Mais en sortirez-vous vraiment ? Vous allez peut-être y passer un jour ou deux, un mois, un an... ou l'éternité. Tremblant de peur à l'idée de ce qui vous attend. Une petite créature non-humaine fragile, prisonnière de ses propres jouets et des peurs qui la rongent. Qui donc est dans une cage, à présent ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns quiet and insinuating, and a smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Yes, you are safe... for now. But as soon as you step out from behind this field, who knows in what shadowy corner we'll catch you? Any step outside could mean your death. Then again, perhaps you will not come out. You might sit here for a day or two, a month, a year... forever. Sitting and trembling. A small, frail inhuman, trapped in a prison of his own toys and fear. Which of us is in a cage now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Ulfar se fait pleine de sous-entendus tandis qu'un sourire se dessine sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Oui, vous êtes à l'abri... pour l'instant. Mais dès que vous quitterez ce champ, qui sait dans quel recoin sombre nous vous rattraperons ? Le moindre pas à l'extérieur pourrait signer votre arrêt de mort. Mais en sortirez-vous vraiment ? Vous allez peut-être y passer un jour ou deux, un mois, un an... ou l'éternité. Tremblant de peur à l'idée de ce qui vous attend. Une petite créature inhumaine fragile, prisonnière de ses propres jouets et des peurs qui la rongent. Qui donc est dans une cage, à présent ? »

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ulfar se vuelve tenue e insinuante, y una sonrisa surge de sus labios.{/n} «Sí, no te va a pasar nada... de momento. Pero a saber en qué cuneta te encontramos en cuanto pongas un pie fuera de este campo. Un paso en falso podría suponer la muerte. Podrías quedarte aquí un día o dos, un mes, un año... toda la vida. Sentado y temblando. Un pequeño y frágil inhumano, atrapado en una prisión de sus propios juguetes y miedo. ¿Ahora quién de nosotros está en una jaula?».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns quiet and insinuating, and a smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Yes, you are safe... for now. But as soon as you step out from behind this field, who knows in what shadowy corner we'll catch you? Any step outside could mean your death. Then again, perhaps you will not come out. You might sit here for a day or two, a month, a year... forever. Sitting and trembling. A small, frail inhuman, trapped in a prison of his own toys and fear. Which of us is in a cage now?"

Pero a saber en qué cuneta te encontramos en cuanto pongas un pie fuera de este campo. Un paso en falso podría suponer la muerte. Podrías quedarte aquí un día o dos, un mes, un año... toda la vida. Sentado y temblando. Un pequeño y frágil inhumano, atrapado en una prisión de sus propios juguetes y miedo. ¿Ahora quién de nosotros está en una jaula?».

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Stimme wird leise, als wolle er etwas andeuten. Ein Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n} "Ja, Ihr seid sicher ... für Erste. Aber sobald Ihr dieses Feld verlasst, wer weiß, in welcher dunklen Ecke wir Euch schließlich erwischen? Jeder Schritt nach draußen könnte Euren Tod bedeuten. Aber vielleicht kommt Ihr ja gar nicht raus. Ihr könntet hier ausharren, einen Tag oder zwei, ein Jahr ... für immer. Zitternd. Ein kleiner, zerbrechlicher Nicht-Mensch in einem Gefängnis seiner eigenen Spielzeuge und Ängste. Wer von uns sitzt jetzt im Käfig?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns quiet and insinuating, and a smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Yes, you are safe... for now. But as soon as you step out from behind this field, who knows in what shadowy corner we'll catch you? Any step outside could mean your death. Then again, perhaps you will not come out. You might sit here for a day or two, a month, a year... forever. Sitting and trembling. A small, frail inhuman, trapped in a prison of his own toys and fear. Which of us is in a cage now?"

Aber sobald Ihr dieses Feld verlasst, wer weiß, in welcher dunklen Ecke wir Euch schließlich erwischen? Jeder Schritt nach draußen könnte Euren Tod bedeuten. Aber vielleicht kommt Ihr ja gar nicht raus. Ihr könntet hier ausharren, einen Tag oder zwei, ein Jahr ... für immer. Zitternd. Ein kleiner, zerbrechlicher Nicht-Mensch in einem Gefängnis seiner eigenen Spielzeuge und Ängste. Wer von uns sitzt jetzt im Käfig?"

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın dudaklarına bir gülümseme yerleşiyor, sesi ise alçalarak daha içe işler bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Evet, güvendesin. Şimdilik. O perdenin arkasından çıktığın an ise seni hangi karanlık köşede pusuya düşüreceğimizi kim bilir? Dışarıya atacağın tek bir adım, ölüm anlamına gelebilir. Tabii belki de dışarı çıkmazsın. Bir gün, iki gün, bir ay, bir yıl veya belki sonsuza kadar orada oturursun. Oturur, korkudan tir tir titrersin. Oyuncaklarınla korkundan meydana gelme bir hapishanede mahsur kalmış küçük, kırılgan bir insan dışısın. Hangimiz kafese kısılmış?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice turns quiet and insinuating, and a smile plays on his lips.{/n} "Yes, you are safe... for now. But as soon as you step out from behind this field, who knows in what shadowy corner we'll catch you? Any step outside could mean your death. Then again, perhaps you will not come out. You might sit here for a day or two, a month, a year... forever. Sitting and trembling. A small, frail inhuman, trapped in a prison of his own toys and fear. Which of us is in a cage now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın dudaklarına bir gülümseme yerleşiyor, sesi ise alçalarak daha içe işler bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Evet, güvendesin. Şimdilik. O perdenin arkasından çıktığın an ise seni hangi karanlık köşede pusuya düşüreceğimizi kim bilir? Dışarıya atacağın tek bir adım, ölüm anlamına gelebilir. Tabii belki de dışarı çıkmazsın. Bir gün, iki gün, bir ay, bir yıl veya belki sonsuza kadar orada oturursun. Oturur ve korkudan tir tir titrersin. Kendi oyuncaklarından ve korkusundan meydana gelme bir hapishanede mahsur kalmış küçük, kırılgan bir insan dışı. Kafese hangimiz kısılmışız ha?"
